view.label: AWS EC2
view.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_overview":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5,"numberPrecision":2,"fields":{"CPUUtilization":{"unit":"%","unitPosition":"after"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_overview"},"title":"Instances","description":""},"viz_active_hosts":{"type":"viz.singlevalue","options":{},"encoding":{"trend":"primary[1]","majorColor":{"field":"primary[1]","format":{"type":"rangevalue","ranges":[{"from":100,"value":"#cb3b43"},{"from":70,"to":100,"value":"#ff7152"},{"from":50,"to":70,"value":"#fc9850"},{"from":30,"to":50,"value":"#f4df7a"},{"from":10,"value":"#53a051","to":30},{"to":10,"value":"#5fbcff"}]}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_active_hosts"},"title":"Active Hosts"},"viz_active_hosts_per_type":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_active_hosts_per_type"},"title":"Active Hosts per Instance Type"},"viz_active_hosts_per_az":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_active_hosts_per_az"},"title":"Active Hosts by AZ"},"viz_cpu_perc":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_cpu_perc"},"title":"CPU %"},"viz_top_inst_cpu":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5,"numberPrecision":2,"fields":{"CPUUtilization":{"unit":"%","unitPosition":"after"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_inst_cpu"},"title":"Top Instances by CPU %"},"viz_top_img_cpu":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5,"numberPrecision":1,"fields":{"CPUUtilization":{"unit":"%","unitPosition":"after"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_img_cpu"},"title":"Top Images by Mean CPU %"},"viz_disk_ops_min":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"encoding":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_disk_ops_min"},"title":"Disk Ops/Min"},"viz_network_bytes_in":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"dataSources":{"primary":"dc_network_bytes_in"},"title":"Network Bytes In"},"viz_network_bytes_out":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_bytes_out"},"title":"Network Bytes Out"},"viz_disk_IO_bytes_in":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","layout.splitSeries":"$split_series_tok$","layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":"$split_series_tok$","legend.placement":"right","legend.mode":"seriesCompare"},"encoding":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_disk_IO_bytes_in"},"title":"Disk I/O Bytes/Min"},"viz_top_network_bytes_in":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5,"numberPrecision":2,"useThousandSeparators":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_network_bytes_in"},"title":"Top Network Bytes In/Min"},"viz_top_network_bytes_out":{"type":"viz.table","options":{"count":5,"numberPrecision":2,"useThousandSeparators":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_top_network_bytes_out"},"title":"Top Network Bytes Out/Min"},"viz_disk_24h_change":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisY2.enabled":true,"chart.overlayFields":"Change(%)","lineWidth":5,"legend.placement":"bottom"},"encoding":{"x":"primary._time","y":"primary.Today","y2":"primary.Change(%)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_disk_24h_change"},"title":"Disk Metrics 24h Change %","description":""},"viz_network_in_24h_change":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisY2.enabled":true,"chart.overlayFields":"Change(%)","lineWidth":5,"legend.placement":"bottom"},"encoding":{"x":"primary._time","y":"primary.Today","y2":"primary.Change(%)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_in_24h_change"},"title":"Network In Metrics 24h Change %","description":""},"viz_network_out_24h_change":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisY2.enabled":true,"chart.overlayFields":"Change(%)","lineWidth":5,"legend.placement":"bottom"},"encoding":{"x":"primary._time","y":"primary.Today","y2":"primary.Change(%)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_network_out_24h_change"},"title":"Network Out Metrics 24h Change %"},"viz_gNFl1Vw9":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"strokeWidth":0}}},"dataSources":{"ds_instance_az":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats count WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name=* AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) BY aws_availability_zone","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Availability Zones"},"ds_instance_types":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats count WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name=* AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) BY aws_instance_type","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Instance Types"},"ds_instances":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats count WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name=* AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) BY InstanceId | join type=left InstanceId [| msearch index="sim_metrics" | search sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" | table InstanceId, aws_tag_Name] | eval instance= if(isnull(aws_tag_Name), "ID: ".InstanceId, "ID: ".InstanceId." Tag Name: ".aws_tag_Name) | sort InstanceID | table instance, InstanceId","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Instances"},"ds_overview":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="CPUUtilization" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) BY InstanceId span=$span_tok$
| stats latest(value) as value by InstanceId 
| join type=left InstanceId [| msearch index="sim_metrics" |search sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" | table InstanceId, aws_tag_Name, aws_availability_zone, aws_instance_type, aws_state ]
| rename InstanceId as "Instance ID", value as "CPUUtilization", aws_tag_Name as "Name", aws_availability_zone as "Availabilility Zone", aws_instance_type as "Instance Type", aws_state as "State"
| table "Instance ID", "CPUUtilization", "Name", "Availabilility Zone", "Instance Type", "State"
| sort "Instance ID"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"overview"},"ds_active_hosts":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="*" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND aws_state="*running*" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) BY InstanceId span=$span_tok$
| chart count(InstanceId) over _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"active_hosts"},"ds_active_hosts_per_type":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="*" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND aws_state="*running*" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) by InstanceId, aws_instance_type span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(dc(InstanceId)) as "Sparkline" dc(InstanceId) as Count by aws_instance_type
| rename aws_instance_type as "Instance Type"
| sort -Count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Active Hosts per Instance Type"},"ds_active_hosts_per_az":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="*" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND aws_state="*running*" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) by InstanceId, aws_availability_zone span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(dc(InstanceId)) as Sparkline dc(InstanceId) as Count by aws_availability_zone
| rename aws_availability_zone as "Availability Zone"
| sort -Count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Active Hosts by AZ"},"ds_cpu_perc":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as Avg, max(_value) as Max, min(_value) as Min, median(_value) as Median p10(_value) as P10, p90(_value) as P90 WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="CPUUtilization" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(Avg) as Avg, avg(Max) as Max, avg(Min), as Min, avg(Median) as Median, avg(P10) as P10 avg(P90) as P90 span=$span_tok$
| eval Avg=round(Avg,2), Max=round(Max,2), Min =round(Min,2), Median=round(Median,2), P10=round(P10,2), P90=round(P90,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"CPU %"},"ds_top_inst_cpu":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as avg, WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="CPUUtilization" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) by InstanceId span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(avg)) as "Sparkline" latest(avg) as avg by InstanceId
| sort -avg
| rename avg as CPUUtilization, InstanceId as "Instance ID"
| table "Sparkline", CPUUtilization, "Instance ID"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Instances by CPU %"},"ds_top_img_cpu":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as avg, WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="CPUUtilization" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) by aws_image_id span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(avg)) as "Sparkline" latest(avg) as avg by aws_image_id
| sort -avg
| rename aws_image_id as "Image ID", avg as CPUUtilization
| table "Sparkline", CPUUtilization, "Image ID"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Images by Mean CPU %"},"ds_disk_ops_min":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND (metric_name="DiskWriteOps" OR metric_name="DiskReadOps") AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) BY metric_name span=$span_tok$ 
| timechart avg(value) span=$span_tok$ by metric_name 
| eval DiskReadOps=round(DiskReadOps,2), DiskWriteOps=round(DiskWriteOps,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Disk Ops/Min"},"dc_network_bytes_in":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as Avg, max(_value) as Max, min(_value) as Min, median(_value) as Median p10(_value) as P10, p90(_value) as P90 WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkIn" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(Avg) as Avg, avg(Max) as Max, avg(Min), as Min, avg(Median) as Median, avg(P10) as P10 avg(P90) as P90 span=$span_tok$
| eval Avg=round(Avg,2), Max=round(Max,2), Min =round(Min,2), Median=round(Median,2), P10=round(P10,2), P90=round(P90,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network Bytes In"},"ds_network_bytes_out":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as Avg, max(_value) as Max, min(_value) as Min, median(_value) as Median p10(_value) as P10, p90(_value) as P90 WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkOut" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(Avg) as Avg, avg(Max) as Max, avg(Min), as Min, avg(Median) as Median, avg(P10) as P10 avg(P90) as P90 span=$span_tok$
| eval Avg=round(Avg,2), Max=round(Max,2), Min =round(Min,2), Median=round(Median,2), P10=round(P10,2), P90=round(P90,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network Bytes Out"},"ds_disk_IO_bytes_in":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as value WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND (metric_name="DiskWriteBytes" OR metric_name="DiskReadBytes") AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) BY metric_name span=$span_tok$
| timechart avg(value) span=$span_tok$ by metric_name 
| eval DiskWriteBytes=round(DiskWriteBytes,2), DiskReadBytes=round(DiskReadBytes,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Disk I/O Bytes/Min"},"ds_top_network_bytes_in":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as avg, WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkIn" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) by InstanceId span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(avg)) as "Sparkline" latest(avg) as avg by InstanceId
| sort -avg
| rename avg as "Bytes In/Min", InstanceId as "Instance ID"
| table "Sparkline", "Bytes In/Min", "Instance ID"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Network Bytes In/Min"},"ds_top_network_bytes_out":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg(_value) as avg, WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkOut" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) by InstanceId span=$span_tok$
| chart sparkline(avg(avg)) as "Sparkline" latest(avg) as avg by InstanceId
| sort -avg
| rename avg as "Bytes Out/Min", InstanceId as "Instance ID"
| table "Sparkline", "Bytes Out/Min", "Instance ID"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Top Network Bytes Out/Min"},"ds_disk_24h_change":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as today WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Disk*" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-1d@h latest=@h by metric_name 
| timechart avg(today) as Today span=1h 
| appendcols 
 [ mstats sum(_value) as old WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="Disk*" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-2d@h latest=-1d@h by metric_name 
 | timechart avg(old) as Old span=1h 
 | eval _time = relative_time(_time,"+1d")] 
| eval "Change(%)"=round((Today/Old)-1,2), Today=round(Today,2) 
| fields - Old","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Disk Metrics 24h Change %"},"ds_network_in_24h_change":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as today WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkIn" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-1d@h latest=@h
| timechart avg(today) as Today span=1h 
| appendcols [mstats sum(_value) as old WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkIn" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-2d@h latest=-1d@h | timechart avg(old) as Old span=1h 
| eval _time = relative_time(_time,"+1d")]
| eval "Change(%)"=round((Today/Old)-1,2), Today=round(Today,2)
| fields - Old","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network In Metrics 24h Change %"},"ds_network_out_24h_change":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats sum(_value) as today WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkOut" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-1d@h latest=@h
| timechart avg(today) as Today span=1h 
| appendcols [mstats sum(_value) as old WHERE `sim_metrics_indexes` AND metric_name="NetworkOut" AND sf_streamLabel="DSIM:AWS/EC2" AND (InstanceId IN($instance_id_tok$)) AND (aws_instance_type IN ($instance_type_tok$)) AND (aws_availability_zone IN ($instance_az_tok$)) span=$span_tok$ earliest=-2d@h latest=-1d@h | timechart avg(old) as Old span=1h 
| eval _time = relative_time(_time,"+1d")]
| eval "Change(%)"=round((Today/Old)-1,2), Today=round(Today,2)
| fields - Old","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr.earliest$","latest":"$tr.latest$"}},"name":"Network Out Metrics 24h Change %"}},"inputs":{"input_instance":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Instances","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"instance_id_tok","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[1]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_instances"}},"input_instance_type":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Instance Types","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"instance_type_tok","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_instance_types"}},"input_instance_az":{"type":"input.multiselect","title":"Availability Zones","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"instance_az_tok","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_instance_az"}},"input_time":{"options":{"defaultValue":"-24h@h,now","token":"tr"},"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Picker"},"input_resolution":{"options":{"defaultValue":"5m","token":"span_tok"},"type":"input.text","title":"Resolution"},"input_split_series":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Split Series","options":{"items":[{"label":"True","value":"true"},{"label":"False","value":"false"}],"token":"split_series_tok","defaultValue":"true"}}},"layout":{"globalInputs":["input_instance","input_instance_type","input_instance_az","input_time","input_resolution","input_split_series"],"type":"absolute","options":{"width":1400,"height":1700,"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_gNFl1Vw9","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1400,"h":310}},{"item":"viz_overview","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":1380,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_active_hosts","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":320,"w":330,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_active_hosts_per_type","type":"block","position":{"x":350,"y":320,"w":510,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_active_hosts_per_az","type":"block","position":{"x":870,"y":320,"w":517,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_cpu_perc","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":600,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_inst_cpu","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":600,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_img_cpu","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":600,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_disk_ops_min","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":870,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_bytes_in","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":1140,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_bytes_out","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":1410,"w":440,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_disk_IO_bytes_in","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":870,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_network_bytes_in","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":1140,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_top_network_bytes_out","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":1410,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_disk_24h_change","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":870,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_in_24h_change","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":1140,"w":460,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_network_out_24h_change","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":1410,"w":460,"h":260}}]},"description":"","title":"AWS EC2"}
